00050 namespace TREX {
00051   namespace europa {
00052     
00070     class EuropaReactor :public TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor {
00071     public:
00072       EuropaReactor(TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg);
00073       ~EuropaReactor();
00074 
00075       // EUROPA callbacks
00076       void removed(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00077       void request(EUROPA::ObjectId const &tl, EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00078       void relax();
00079       void recall(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00080       void notify(EUROPA::ObjectId const &tl, EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00081 
00082       bool in_scope(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00083 
00084       bool dispatch_window(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj, 
00085                         TREX::transaction::TICK &from, 
00086                         TREX::transaction::TICK &to);
00087 
00088       Assembly &assembly() {
00089         return m_assembly;
00090       }
00091 
00092       TREX::utils::internals::LogEntry 
00093       log(std::string const &context) {
00094         return syslog(context);
00095       }
00096 
00097       void end_deliberation() {
00098         m_assembly.mark_inactive();
00099         m_completedThisTick = true;
00100        if( m_steps>1 ) {
00101          syslog()<<"Deliberation completed in "<<m_steps<<" steps";
00102          m_core.archive();
00103          logPlan();
00104        }
00105       }
00106 
00107       void logPlan(std::string fname=std::string()) const {
00108        if( fname.empty() )
00109          fname = "plan";
00110        std::string dbg_pln = manager().file_name(getName().str()+"."+fname+".dot");
00111        std::ofstream of(dbg_pln.c_str());
00112        m_assembly.logPlan(of);
00113       }
00114     private:
00115       // TREX transaction callbacks
00116       void notify(TREX::transaction::Observation const &o);
00117       void handleRequest(TREX::transaction::goal_id const &g);
00118       void handleRecall(TREX::transaction::goal_id const &g);
00119 
00120       // TREX execution callbacks
00121       void handleInit();
00122       void handleTickStart();
00123       bool synchronize();
00124       bool hasWork();
00125       void resume();
00126 
00127       typedef std::map<EUROPA::eint, TREX::transaction::goal_id> europa_mapping;
00128 
00129       europa_mapping m_external_goals;
00130       europa_mapping m_internal_goals;
00131 
00132       Assembly m_assembly;
00133       DbCore   m_core;
00134 
00135       void reset_deliberation() {
00136         m_planStart = getInitialTick();
00137         m_steps = 0;
00138       }
00139       bool deactivate_solver();
00140       void set_filter(DeliberationFilter *filt) {
00141        m_filter = filt;
00142       }
00143       
00144       TREX::transaction::TICK m_planStart;
00145       bool                    m_completedThisTick;
00146       unsigned long           m_steps;
00147 
00148       DeliberationFilter *m_filter;
00149 
00150       friend class Assembly;
00151       friend class DeliberationFilter;
00152     }; //TREX::europa::EuropaReactor
